vote.text: Amendment SA 4921 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4921 proposed by Senator Menendez for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S454; text: CR S454) To make technical amendments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4921 proposed by Senator Menendez for Senator Shaheen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4921 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
